TEXT.TITLE: HONDURAS SEEKS PL480 VESSELS FOR TALLOW DELIVERY
TEXT.BODY: Honduras will tender March 26 under PL480 for U.S. and non-U.S. flag vessels to import 1,500 tonnes of tallow in bulk, an agent for the country said. The agent said delivery includes laydays of April 5-15. Offers are due by 1200 hrs EST, March 26, and will remain valid until the close of business the following day, the agent said. Reuter
